articles.author: K.J. Yossman
articles.title: 'Black Mirror' Renewed for Season 7 (EXCLUSIVE) - Variety
articles.description: 'Black Mirror' has been renewed for Season 7.
articles.content:
“Black Mirror” is coming back for a seventh season, Variety understands.
The hit sci-fi show created by Charlie Brooker returned to screens earlier this year after a four-year hiatus, garnering reco… [+2161 chars]
